summary:
Avengers Endgame: One of the Best Movies of the MCU!!!
(WARNING: Major Spoilers)
title:
Avengers Endgame: One of the Best Movies of the MCU!!!
(WARNING: Major Spoilers)
body:
This movie was incredible with an amazing send off to all the characters of the MCU (minus Daredevil, the Runaways, Phil Coulson, and other TV MCU shows, but they have their own thing).

The movie had incredible moments including #$$@$ing Steve Rogers aka Captain America lifting Mjolnir, Thor using Mjolnir as a baseball and Stormbreaker as a bat, Carol and the other female heroes joining forces, and the return of the people who were “dusted” to join the final battle against Thanos.

It was a truly great and iconic superhero movie!!!

…but there are some flaws I would want to talk about.

The Plot

So, we start with the end of Infinity War as all of the remaining Avengers recover from their defeat with Carol Danvers aka Captain Marvel joining after receiving Fury’s page. Also Tony Stark aka Iron Man is dying in space and Carol saves him. They then prepare to retrieve the Infinity Gauntlet from Thanos, only to find out that he destroyed them and Thor killing him by “aiming for the head”.

Flash forward 5 years later, Scott Lang aka Ant-Man is freed from the Quantum Realm by accident and goes to the Avengers Compound to meet up with Steve Rogers and Natasha Romanoff aka Black Widow. Other stuff includes Bruce becomes Professor Hulk, Tony has a daughter, Morgan, with Pepper, and Thor turns into a drunk Big Lebowski. Tony then figures out time travel, yeah, i guess, and goes to help the other Avengers. They plan to create their own Infinity Gauntlet by going back in time to take the stones from different points in time and reverse the effects of Thanos’s snap.

I thought the whole “time travel adventures” was pretty obvious even if you didn’t know anything about Infinity War as it seems to be the solution to most apocalypses. I was a bit confused with the way they talked about time travel that won’t create time paradoxes. But I guess it was a way to prevent any more complicated timelines and stuff. This also gives us an opportunity to revisit some characters in the past like the Ancient One, the Hydra agents, and Gamora before meeting Peter Quill.

The way they presented all of the people who were dusted as they joined the fight against Thanos was epic and the best superhero fight in the MCU.

The Characters

Okay, I was a bit disappointed that Captain Marvel was barely in this movie and was basically a MacGuffin. Which makes my theories totally pointless. But her taking down the Sanctuary II like nothing and the fight with Thanos kind of made up for it. Still, I wish that Brie Larson would have some stronger expressions and emotion to the role, but overall great for what was needed.

The main attraction of this movie was bringing together the original Avengers for one final mission to save the universe. Each of them were changed by their experiences for better or worst such as Bruce finally able to control his Hulk form, Clint Barton, aka Hawkeye, becomes a ruthless assassin known as Ronin, and Thor turning into a fat alcoholic from his failures.

I honestly thought Thor in this movie was only played for laughs with him turning into a drunker version of the Big Lebowski. But I can see how the impact of failing to save his people and stop Thanos would cause him to spiral into a depressed state.

Despite numerous characters getting only a few minutes in the entire 3 hour movie, they each made the best with what they had. With Spider-Man and Iron Man sharing a hug, past Gamora and present Nebula bonding, Scarlet Witch just destroying Thanos, and Captain Marvel and the other female superheroes banding together, it was worth watching for the entirety of the movie at the end.

It was a great sendoff to both Iron Man and Captain America.

Tony Stark did change after his experiences with the Avengers and the Decimation as he lives in a cabin with Pepper and their daughter Morgan. Those experiences also made it so he. He reluctantly returned to help the other Avengers in order to create the Quantum Tunnel. Tony patched things up with Steve when he gives Steve’s shield back. The moment that really stood out was when he used the Infinity Stones to destroy Thanos and his army before saying “I am Iron Man”, but dies as a result of the immense energy of the stones. This is one of the most impactful of the entire movie, thus giving Robert Downey Jr. an excellent final performance as the character who started the MCU.

Steve Rogers has his moments in the movie with him seeing Peggy Carter during his trip to the 1970s, one of those quiet moments that makes you feel Steve’s longing for her. He also tricked the Hydra agents in 2012 into giving him Loki’s scepter by making them believe he was Hydra (an allusion to the comics). During the final battle with Thanos, Steve finally became worthy of wielding Mjolnir and went to town on him like nothing (also another allusion). After Tony’s funeral, Steve travelled through the Quantum Tunnel to return the Infinity Stones and Mjolnir to their intended points in time. But it was revealed that Steve remained in the 1940s with Peggy after finishing his mission and is now Old Man Steve. He then gives his shield to Sam Wilson as the next Captain America. The last scene is Steve and Peggy finally sharing that dance she talked about at the end of Captain America: the First Avenger.

The Conclusion

The movie has numerous great moments that greatly defines the franchise itself and sets the bar higher. Even though the flaws can be distracting like how Old Man Steve seemingly creates a sort of paradox in the main timeline as well as having two versions of him present in one timeline; they don’t distract from how amazing this movie is and what these characters represent to the dedicated audience of this decade old franchise. 

Go and watch this movie.

tags: im such a lazy fuckin tagger alkdsfhjas
summary: Congrats on the followers pal!! Could you maybe give some blurbs or a mini-fic where it’s Christmas and the holy trinity sit...
question: Congrats on the followers pal!! Could you maybe give some blurbs or a mini-fic where it’s Christmas and the holy trinity sit around the fire and just relax and exchange gifts?
answer:
have some blurbs bc I just woke up and even tho it’s cold in socal rn I cannot get into the christmas mood lmao

  • I feel like the three of them don’t really have Christmas traditions of their own, except maybe Carol and whatever she did with the Rambeaus, or outside of what they do with the rest of the Avengers
  • so their first christmas/holiday season away from that, they decide to make their own traditions, taking the holidays easier way easier and more lowkey than what they did before
  • if they’re not with their friends it’s all hot chocolate and snacks covering the coffee table as they’re bundled up on the couch under a pile of blankets watching cheesy movies
  • as the only one without powers, Nat always “guilt trips” Wanda and Carol into doing everything/as much as they let slide
  • and if they don’t she always offers to make it up by making peanut butter sandwiches (which they’re a little sick of if they’re being honest, but they don’t want to disappoint her so they always eat all of them)
  • one year Wanda is influenced by Tony and with his help, she gets the cheesiest (and ugliest) sweaters for the other two

summary: Am I really gonna get both the digital copy of Captain Marvel so I can have it sooner and the physical copy as soon as it comes...
body:
Am I really gonna get both the digital copy of Captain Marvel so I can have it sooner and the physical copy as soon as it comes out too? Probably.

Will I regret it? Definitely not.

summary: Congratulations, Veronica, you’ve been accepted to Royal as Brie Larson! Unpack your things, get settled, have a look around the...
caption:
Congratulations, Veronica, you’ve been accepted to Royal as Brie Larson!

Unpack your things, get settled, have a look around the town, get to know some people – you’re here to stay, after all!

For your first steps, please read this page.


ooc info

Name / Preferred Pronouns: Veronica. she/her

Age: 29

Timezone: EST

ic info

Name: Brie Larson

Age / Birthday: October 1, 1989. (29)

title: Coffee with Carol
body:
Prompt: “ Could you do a fic of Carol and reader going on a first date,,, maybe just a coffee date and so much fluff ;) thank you!”

First of all sorry honey for the long wait but here it is.

Carol Danvers x (fem)Reader

Words: 1050 oops

Warning: nothing aside from the ususal errors and I am not quite happy with the ending but I hope y’all like it. and a mention of a dumb dude at a bar

—————————————————————————————–

You nervously waited in front of the café, checking the name, address and time for the fifth time in 10 minutes to make sure you were at the right place. You were suppose to meet Carol here at 3, it was a quarter past now and you grew more anxious with each passing minute.

You met her a few nights ago at a bar, where she sang karaoke like a mad woman and rescued so from a shady dude who was trying to hit on you. Both of you immediately hit it of and spend the rest of the night together laughing and talking. At the end of it she took your phone, saved her number ( as Carol 😉 ) and asked if you wanted to meet up for a coffee.

You were like a solid 80% sure this was supposed to be a date but with someone as cool and beautiful as Carol you weren’t quite sure, since you know, you were just you.

You started bouncing your leg, the rather harsh wind biting at your skin. But you didn’t wanna go inside just yet, not without Carol, what if she stood you up, you would look like a fool, not that you would think Carol would let you down like that but still…. she was 15 minutes late… And with your wildly spiraling thoughts you didn’t even register the person suddenly standing in front of you.

“Hey gorgeous, waiting for someone?”, Carol asked with her signature smirk, using the same pick-up line the creep from a few nights ago tried using on you.
“Ohh uh ewww” you let out slightly startled and reminded of the weirdo from the bar.

“Ouch! Not happy to see me?” Carol teased. “Well I am, I was starting to think I would never see you again,” you said as Carol lead you inside the Café. She chuckled but stopped to grab your hand softly “ I am so sorry about that, there was an inconvenience at work but I came here as fast as I could” you took a good look at her.

She was wearing a brown leather jacket (ya know the one ;D), a white shirt and blue jeans, she looked so cute with her slightly tousled hair. It did look like she ran all the way to the Café.

“But I am gonna make it up to you. Pick whatever you want, my treat, drinks and cake, if you like.” She smiled brightly letting go of your hand to gently nudge you in the direction if the register, her hand now on your lower back.

“Hmm,    you are still not quite forgiven but it’s a good start” you teased, both of you falling into light banter, just like the night at the bar. “I’ll take a Café Latte and a piece of carrot cake, if that’s ok” you continued.

“Anything for a pretty girl like you” Carol bumped in you with her shoulder. A blush was making its way up your neck, “ how about I order and you look for a place to sit?” Carol smiled at you.

You nodded and turned around to find a compfy spot, you looked around the café, it was really cute. It had small bookshelves and soft relaxing music was playing in the background.
Your heart sped up as you remembered that you told Carol that you loved small coffee shops like this and it seemed like she remembered.

As you placed down your bag at a table for two near the window, your eyes trailed back to Carol, who was now waiting for your order to finish.
With all that witty banter you were now pretty sure this was a date. And you weren’t quite sure whether to be nervous or exited. However Carol seemed to make it so easy to talk to her.

Speaking of which, she placed your coffee and cake on the table. “Here you go” she said. Thanking her, you took a big sip of the coffee.
“Sooo, what have you been up to the last couple of days?” the blonde questioned. You covered most of the usual Smalltalk like work, family and all that jass, the night at the bar. So with that question the easy going conversation started.

Carol would stop to ask more, smirk and look you deep in the eyes whenever she had the chance. Your heart would beat like a drum every time she would give you a teasing nickname or laugh at your terrible (but honestly quite good) jokes.

By the end of the coffee and cake you two were nearly buzzing in your seats, exited at how good things were going.

———————————————-

“I had a wonderful time” you said as you stepped out of the café. “ So did I, and I would love to repeat that again sometime…soon” Carol said turning to you. “Well you have my number, all you gotta do is text” you shyly smiled at her.

Of course Carol smirked but you could also make out a faint blush on her cheeks. “Oh I sure will, gorgeous!” said the chocolate eyed woman as she gave you a quick peck on the cheek. You looked down with a chuckle, shaking your head. Trying to hide the massive blush appearing in your face.

“Stop saying that you remind me of that creepy man,” you mumbled.              “But why would I stop? It’s true and I kinda have to thank him for being so dumb, he gave me the perfect reason to talk to you.” Carol said, tilting her head slightly.


“Oh so you had me on your mind before you talked to me? I thought this was more of an accident,” you teased her.
“Oh… now that is not what I wanted you to take away from that statement, I think my phone is ringing” Carol pretended to look for her phone “it’s work probably, I have to leave now.” She hastily said as she gave you another kiss on the cheek and turning around to walk off fast.

“See you soon, pretty girl!” she yelled tuning her head over her shoulder, before disappearing behind a corner.

You stood still, smiling to yourself, happy that you could maker her nervous like she made you feel all the time. Your phone buzzed a few minutes later;

Seriously though, I had a great time and I can’t wait to see you again! - Carol 😉

——————————————————————–

It’s ehhh but maybe you like it @warlikebisexual

Of course Carol smirked but you could also make out a faint blush on her cheeks. “Oh I sure will, gorgeous!” said the chocolate eyed woman as she gave you a quick peck on the cheek. You looked down with a chuckle, shaking your head. Trying to hide the massive blush appearing in your face.

“Stop saying that you remind me of that creepy man,” you mumbled.              “But why would I stop? It’s true and I kinda have to thank him for being so dumb, he gave me the perfect reason to talk to you.” Carol said, tilting her head slightly.


“Oh so you had me on your mind before you talked to me? I thought this was more of an accident,” you teased her.
“Oh… now that is not what I wanted you to take away from that statement, I think my phone is ringing” Carol pretended to look for her phone “it’s work probably, I have to leave now.” She hastily said as she gave you another kiss on the cheek and turning around to walk off fast.

“See you soon, pretty girl!” she yelled tuning her head over her shoulder, before disappearing behind a corner.

You stood still, smiling to yourself, happy that you could maker her nervous like she made you feel all the time. Your phone buzzed a few minutes later;

Seriously though, I had a great time and I can’t wait to see you again! - Carol 😉

You started bouncing your leg, the rather harsh wind biting at your skin. But you didn’t wanna go inside just yet, not without Carol, what if she stood you up, you would look like a fool, not that you would think Carol would let you down like that but still…. she was 15 minutes late… And with your wildly spiraling thoughts you didn’t even register the person suddenly standing in front of you.

“Hey gorgeous, waiting for someone?”, Carol asked with her signature smirk, using the same pick-up line the creep from a few nights ago tried using on you.
“Ohh uh ewww” you let out slightly startled and reminded of the weirdo from the bar.

“Ouch! Not happy to see me?” Carol teased. “Well I am, I was starting to think I would never see you again,” you said as Carol lead you inside the Café. She chuckled but stopped to grab your hand softly “ I am so sorry about that, there was an inconvenience at work but I came here as fast as I could” you took a good look at her.

She was wearing a brown leather jacket (ya know the one ;D), a white shirt and blue jeans, she looked so cute with her slightly tousled hair. It did look like she ran all the way to the Café.

“But I am gonna make it up to you. Pick whatever you want, my treat, drinks and cake, if you like.” She smiled brightly letting go of your hand to gently nudge you in the direction if the register, her hand now on your lower back.

“Hmm,    you are still not quite forgiven but it’s a good start” you teased, both of you falling into light banter, just like the night at the bar. “I’ll take a Café Latte and a piece of carrot cake, if that’s ok” you continued.

“Anything for a pretty girl like you” Carol bumped in you with her shoulder. A blush was making its way up your neck, “ how about I order and you look for a place to sit?” Carol smiled at you.

You nodded and turned around to find a compfy spot, you looked around the café, it was really cute. It had small bookshelves and soft relaxing music was playing in the background.
Your heart sped up as you remembered that you told Carol that you loved small coffee shops like this and it seemed like she remembered.

As you placed down your bag at a table for two near the window, your eyes trailed back to Carol, who was now waiting for your order to finish.
With all that witty banter you were now pretty sure this was a date. And you weren’t quite sure whether to be nervous or exited. However Carol seemed to make it so easy to talk to her.

Speaking of which, she placed your coffee and cake on the table. “Here you go” she said. Thanking her, you took a big sip of the coffee.
“Sooo, what have you been up to the last couple of days?” the blonde questioned. You covered most of the usual Smalltalk like work, family and all that jass, the night at the bar. So with that question the easy going conversation started.

Carol would stop to ask more, smirk and look you deep in the eyes whenever she had the chance. Your heart would beat like a drum every time she would give you a teasing nickname or laugh at your terrible (but honestly quite good) jokes.

By the end of the coffee and cake you two were nearly buzzing in your seats, exited at how good things were going.

———————————————-

“I had a wonderful time” you said as you stepped out of the café. “ So did I, and I would love to repeat that again sometime…soon” Carol said turning to you. “Well you have my number, all you gotta do is text” you shyly smiled at her.

Of course Carol smirked but you could also make out a faint blush on her cheeks. “Oh I sure will, gorgeous!” said the chocolate eyed woman as she gave you a quick peck on the cheek. You looked down with a chuckle, shaking your head. Trying to hide the massive blush appearing in your face.

“Stop saying that you remind me of that creepy man,” you mumbled.              “But why would I stop? It’s true and I kinda have to thank him for being so dumb, he gave me the perfect reason to talk to you.” Carol said, tilting her head slightly.


“Oh so you had me on your mind before you talked to me? I thought this was more of an accident,” you teased her.
“Oh… now that is not what I wanted you to take away from that statement, I think my phone is ringing” Carol pretended to look for her phone “it’s work probably, I have to leave now.” She hastily said as she gave you another kiss on the cheek and turning around to walk off fast.

“See you soon, pretty girl!” she yelled tuning her head over her shoulder, before disappearing behind a corner.

You stood still, smiling to yourself, happy that you could maker her nervous like she made you feel all the time. Your phone buzzed a few minutes later;

Seriously though, I had a great time and I can’t wait to see you again! - Carol 😉

——————————————————————–

It’s ehhh but maybe you like it @warlikebisexual
